```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(p8105.datasets)
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
data("instacart")

library(flexdashboard)
```


Column {data-width=650}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart A

```{r barplot, warning=FALSE}
instacart_bar = 
  instacart %>%
	filter(aisle == "baking ingredients") %>% 
  count(product_name) %>%
  filter(n > 100)  %>%
  mutate(
    aisle = factor(product_name),
    aisle = fct_reorder(product_name, n)
  ) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~aisle, y = ~n, type = "bar",colors = "viridis",
    text = ~product_name, color = ~aisle, alpha = 0.5) %>% 
  layout(
    xaxis = list(title = FALSE),
    yaxis = list(title = "Count")
  )

instacart_bar
```

Column {data-width=350}
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

### Chart B

```{r}
insta_sca = instacart %>% 
  group_by(aisle) %>% 
  count(product_name) %>%
  filter(n < 3500) %>%
  mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(n))) %>% 
  filter(rank <2) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~product_name, y = ~n, color = ~aisle, text = ~product_name,
    type = "scatter", colors = "viridis", mode = "markers"
  ) %>% 
  layout(
    xaxis = list(title = FALSE),
    yaxis = list(title = "Count")
  )

insta_sca
```

### Chart C

```{r}
insta_fil = instacart %>%
  filter(aisle == "yogurt") %>% 
  count(product_name) %>%
  filter(n>50) %>%
  mutate(rank = min_rank(desc(n)))%>% 
  filter(rank < 6)

insta_box = instacart %>%
  filter(product_name %in% insta_fil$product_name) %>%
  plot_ly(
    x = ~product_name, y = ~order_hour_of_day,  color = ~product_name, 
    type = "box", colors = "viridis") %>%
  layout(
    xaxis = list(title = FALSE),
    yaxis = list(title = "Order-hour of the day"))

insta_box
```
